mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (name, email, phone, dob, address, enrollment_date) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{dob}, #{address}, #{enrollmentDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET name = #{name}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, dob = #{dob}, address = #{address}, enrollment_date = #{enrollmentDate} WHERE student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.select: SELECT student_id, name, email, phone, dob, address, enrollment_date FROM student
